mapper.insert: insert into ecs_back_action (action_id, back_id, action_user, status_back, status_refund, action_note, log_time) values (#{actionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actionUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusBack,jdbcType=BIT}, #{statusRefund,jdbcType=BIT}, #{actionNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select action_id, back_id, action_user, status_back, status_refund, action_note, log_time from ecs_back_action where action_id = #{actionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
